properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Thine be the glory, risen, conqu'ring Son; endless is the vict'ry Thou o’er death hast won. Angels in bright raiment rolled the stone away, kept the folded grave-clothes where Thy body lay.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Thine be the glory, risen, conqu'ring Son; endless is the vict'ry Thou o’er death hast won.

verse.name: v2
v3
